ModMetaData.name: [PL] Prioritized Kill Dev Tool
ModMetaData.author: ProgrammerLily
ModMetaData.description:
Replaces the vanilla "Kill" dev tool with an intelligent version that only kills the single most relevant object under the mouse cursor.
Kill priority (highest to lowest): • Hostile pawns (raiders, manhunters, etc.) • Mechanoids (hostile or inactive) • Wild animals (especially manhunters) • Items (weapons, apparel, resources) • Buildings (turrets, doors, furniture) • Corpses • Filth, plants, debris • Colonists & player-owned pawns (absolute last priority)
Features: - Only one thing killed per click (or radius mode for multiple) - Follows strict priority, ignoring draw order - Skips colonists unless nothing else is present - Optional log messages showing what was killed - Comprehensive mod settings for customization - Toggle individual target types on/off - Radius mode for area-of-effect killing - Distance-based prioritization options - Updated tooltip: "Kills only the most relevant object under the mouse — enemies first, colonists last."
Configuration: Access mod settings through Options → Mod Settings → Prioritized Kill Tool to customize behavior, enable/disable target types, and configure radius mode.
